Room.Name: Castle Rutger Road
Room.LongDescription: You are almost at the same elevation as the gates to Castle Rutger. The sheer wall of the castle makes you crane your neck to see the tops of the turrets and spires, but several of them are lost in the clouds. The great gate closes at night, but there is a small door, suitable for one person to use, beside the huge metal gate. At night, after the gates close, harpies have been known to attack people outside the castle.
